posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA 4 for sale with photos ** PRICE DROP
posts.post_content:
***Price drop from $2750 to $2600. Paypal (add3%) or postal money order accepted.***

Hello my name is Doug and I am looking to sell my PSA 4 Ty Cobb Green Portrait
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=4&u=17829358[/url]
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=3&u=17829358[/url]

I am asking $2600 as I see them on ebay for $3000 but the price is negotiable so please feel free to make an offer. Thanks
Paypal or postal money order accepted accepted please and 3% included in the above price.

Doug
Kind of confused.  Didn't you originally ask $2,600 obo and now you're lowering it to $2,750?  My math might be off, but that doesn't add up.:eek:

I think he forgot to change the price on the bottom paragraph.  Looks like $2600.

Nice card btw.
